verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּיָ֨הּ׀ <WH1984> hal-lu-Yah Praise הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> ho-Du O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; for [he is] good כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

מִ֗י <WH4310> Mi, Who יְ֭מַלֵּל <WH4448> Ye-mal-lel Who can utter גְּבוּר֣וֹת <WH1369> ge-vu-Rot the mighty acts יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD יַ֝שְׁמִ֗יעַ <WH8085> yash-Mi-a', show כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> te-hil-la-To. deep

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> 'Ash-rei Blessed שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <WH8104> sho-me-Rei [are] they that keep מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> mish-Pat; judgment עֹשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh [and] he that doeth צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> tze-da-Kah righteousness בְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol- all עֵֽת׃ <WH6256> 'Et. at all times

זָכְרֵ֣נִי <WH2142> za-che-Re-ni Remember יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD בִּרְצ֣וֹן <WH7522> bir-Tzon with the favour עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha; [that thou bearest unto] thy people פָּ֝קְדֵ֗נִי <WH6485> pa-ke-De-ni, O visit בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> bi-shu-'a-Te-cha. me with thy salvation

לִרְא֤וֹת׀ <WH7200> lir-'ot That I may see בְּט֘וֹבַ֤ת <WH2896> be-To-Vat the good בְּחִירֶ֗יךָ <WH972> be-chi-Rei-cha, of thy chosen לִ֭שְׂמֹחַ <WH8055> Lis-mo-ach that I may rejoice בְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <WH8057> be-sim-Chat in the gladness גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ <WH1471> go-Ye-cha; of thy nation לְ֝הִתְהַלֵּ֗ל <WH1984> le-hit-hal-Lel, that I may glory עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5159> na-cha-la-Te-cha. with thine inheritance

חָטָ֥אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu We have sinned עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- like אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH1> a-vo-Tei-nu, with our fathers הֶעֱוִ֥ינוּ <WH5753> he-'e-Vi-nu we have committed iniquity הִרְשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <WH7561> hir-Sha-'e-nu. we have done wickedly

אֲב֘וֹתֵ֤ינוּ <WH1> a-Vo-Tei-nu Our fathers בְמִצְרַ֨יִם׀ <WH4714> ve-mitz-Ra-yim in Egypt לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not הִשְׂכִּ֬ילוּ <WH7919> his-Ki-lu understood נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha, not thy wonders לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo did not זָ֭כְרוּ <WH2142> Za-che-ru they remembered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֹ֣ב <WH7230> ro not the multitude חֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <WH2617> cha-sa-Dei-cha; of thy mercies וַיַּמְר֖וּ <WH4784> vai-yam-Ru but provoked עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by יָ֣ם <WH3220> yam [him] at the sea בְּיַם־ <WH3220> be-yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> Suf. [even] at the Red

וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם <WH3467> Vai-yo-shi-'em Nevertheless he saved לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an the sake שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo; them for his name's לְ֝הוֹדִ֗יעַ <WH3045> le-ho-Di-a', to be known אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּבוּרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH1369> ge-vu-ra-To. sake that he might make his mighty power

וַיִּגְעַ֣ר <WH1605> vai-yig-'Ar He rebuked בְּיַם־ <WH3220> be-yam- sea ס֭וּף <WH5488> suf the Red וַֽיֶּחֱרָ֑ב <WH2717> vai-ye-che-Rav; also and it was dried up וַיּוֹלִיכֵ֥ם <WH1980> vai-yo-li-Chem led בַּ֝תְּהֹמ֗וֹת <WH8415> bat-te-ho-Mot, them through the depths כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> kam-mid-Bar. as through the wilderness

וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם <WH3467> Vai-yo-shi-'em And he saved מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> mi-Yad them from the hand שׂוֹנֵ֑א <WH8130> so-Ne; of him that hated וַ֝יִּגְאָלֵ֗ם <WH1350> vai-yig-'a-Lem, [them] and redeemed מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> mi-Yad them from the hand אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> o-Yev. of the enemy

וַיְכַסּוּ־ <WH3680> vay-chas-su- covered מַ֥יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim And the waters צָרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6862> tza-rei-Hem; their enemies אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> 'e-Chad there was not one מֵ֝הֶ֗ם <WH1992> me-Hem, like לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not נוֹתָֽר׃ <WH3498> no-Tar. of them left
וַיַּאֲמִ֥ינוּ <WH539> vai-ya-'a-Mi-nu Then believed בִדְבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> vid-va-Rav; they his words יָ֝שִׁ֗ירוּ <WH7891> ya-Shi-ru, they sang תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> te-hil-la-To. his praise

מִֽ֭הֲרוּ <WH4116> Mi-ha-ru They soon שָׁכְח֣וּ <WH7911> sha-che-Chu forgat מַעֲשָׂ֑יו <WH4639> ma-'a-Sav; his works לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not חִ֝כּ֗וּ <WH2442> chik-Ku, they waited לַעֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6098> la-'a-tza-To. not for his counsel

וַיִּתְאַוּ֣וּ <WH183> vai-yit-'av-Vu But lusted תַ֭אֲוָה <WH8378> Ta-'a-vah exceedingly בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וַיְנַסּוּ־ <WH5254> vay-nas-su- and tempted אֵ֝֗ל <WH410> 'El, God בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ <WH3452> Bi-shi-Mon. in the desert

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten And he gave לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> La-hem them שֶׁאֱלָתָ֑ם <WH7596> she-'e-la-Tam; them their request וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> vay-shal-Lach but sent רָז֣וֹן <WH7332> ra-Zon leanness בְּנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> be-naf-Sham. into their soul

וַיְקַנְא֣וּ <WH7065> vay-kan-'U They envied לְ֭מֹשֶׁה <WH4872> Le-mo-sheh Moses בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> bam-ma-cha-Neh; also in the camp לְ֝אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> le-'a-ha-Ron, [and] Aaron קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> ke-Doosh the saint יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

תִּפְתַּח־ <WH6605> tif-tach- opened אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz The earth וַתִּבְלַ֣ע <WH1104> vat-tiv-La' and swallowed up דָּתָ֑ן <WH1885> da-Tan; Dathan וַ֝תְּכַ֗ס <WH3680> vat-te-Chas, and covered עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat the company אֲבִירָֽם׃ <WH48> 'a-vi-Ram. of Abiram

וַתִּבְעַר־ <WH1197> vat-tiv-'ar- was kindled אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> 'esh And a fire בַּעֲדָתָ֑ם <WH5712> ba-'a-da-Tam; in their company לֶ֝הָבָ֗ה <WH3852> le-ha-Vah, the flame תְּלַהֵ֥ט <WH3857> te-la-Het burned up רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> re-sha-'Im. the wicked

יַעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> ya-'a-su- They made עֵ֥גֶל <WH5695> 'E-gel a calf בְּחֹרֵ֑ב <WH2722> be-cho-Rev; in Horeb וַ֝יִּשְׁתַּחֲו֗וּ <WH7812> vai-yish-ta-cha-Vu, and worshipped לְמַסֵּכָֽה׃ <WH4541> le-mas-se-Chah. the molten image

וַיָּמִ֥ירוּ <WH4171> vai-ya-Mi-ru Thus they changed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כְּבוֹדָ֑ם <WH3519> ke-vo-Dam; their glory בְּתַבְנִ֥ית <WH8403> be-tav-Nit into the similitude שׁ֝֗וֹר <WH7794> vr of an ox אֹכֵ֥ל <WH398> 'o-Chel that eateth עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <WH6212> 'E-sev. grass

שָׁ֭כְחוּ <WH7911> che-chu They forgat אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el God מוֹשִׁיעָ֑ם <WH3467> mo-shi-'Am; their saviour עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh which had done גְדֹל֣וֹת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot great things בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim. in Egypt

נִ֭פְלָאוֹת <WH6381> Nif-la-'ot Wondrous works בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land חָ֑ם <WH2526> Cham; of Ham נ֝וֹרָא֗וֹת <WH3372> no-ra-'ot, [and] terrible things עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and יַם־ <WH3220> yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> Suf. by the Red

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, Therefore he said לְֽהַשְׁמִ֫ידָ֥ם <WH8045> le-hash-Mi-Dam that he would destroy לוּלֵ֡י <WH3884> lu-Lei them had not מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses בְחִיר֗וֹ <WH972> ve-chi-Ro, his chosen עָמַ֣ד <WH5975> 'a-Mad stood בַּפֶּ֣רֶץ <WH6556> bap-Pe-retz him in the breach לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav; before לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> le-ha-Shiv to turn away חֲ֝מָת֗וֹ <WH2534> cha-ma-To, his wrath מֵֽהַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> Me-hash-Chit. lest he should destroy

וַֽ֭יִּמְאֲסוּ <WH3988> Vai-yim-'a-su Yea they despised בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz land חֶמְדָּ֑ה <WH2532> chem-Dah; the pleasant לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ <WH539> he-'e-Mi-nu, they believed לִדְבָרֽוֹ׃ <WH1697> lid-va-Ro. not his word

וַיֵּרָגְנ֥וּ <WH7279> vai-ye-ra-ge-Nu But murmured בְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH168> ve-'o-ho-lei-Hem; in their tents לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <WH8085> me-'U, [and] hearkened בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol not unto the voice יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> vai-yis-Sa Therefore he lifted up יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> la-Hem; like לְהַפִּ֥יל <WH5307> le-hap-Pil against them to overthrow א֝וֹתָ֗ם <WH853> o-Tam, בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar. them in the wilderness

וּלְהַפִּ֣יל <WH5307> u-le-hap-Pil To overthrow זַ֭רְעָם <WH2233> Zar-'om their seed בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim; also among the nations וּ֝לְזָרוֹתָ֗ם <WH2219> u-le-za-ro-Tam, and to scatter בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> ba-'a-ra-Tzot. them in the lands

וַ֭יִּצָּ֣מְדוּ <WH6775> vai-yitz-Tza-me-du They joined לְבַ֣עַל le-Va-'al פְּע֑וֹר <WH1187> pe-'or; themselves also unto Baalpeor וַ֝יֹּאכְל֗וּ <WH398> vai-yo-che-Lu, and ate זִבְחֵ֥י <WH2077> ziv-Chei the sacrifices מֵתִֽים׃ <WH4191> me-Tim. of the dead

וַ֭יַּכְעִיסוּ <WH3707> Vai-yach-'i-su Thus they provoked [him] to anger בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4611> be-ma-'al-lei-Hem; with their inventions וַתִּפְרָץ־ <WH6555> vat-tif-rotz- brake in בָּ֝֗ם Bam, מַגֵּפָֽה׃ <WH4046> mag-ge-Fah. and the plague

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod Then stood up פִּֽ֭ינְחָס <WH6372> Pin-chos Phinehas וַיְפַלֵּ֑ל <WH6419> vay-fal-Lel; and executed judgment וַ֝תֵּעָצַ֗ר <WH6113> vat-te-'a-Tzar, was stayed הַמַּגֵּפָֽה׃ <WH4046> ham-mag-ge-Fah. and [so] the plague

וַתֵּחָ֣שֶׁב <WH2803> vat-te-Cha-shev And that was counted ל֭וֹ lo לִצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> litz-da-Kah; unto him for righteousness לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> le-Dor unto all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <WH1755> va-Dor, generations עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. evermore

וַ֭יַּקְצִיפוּ <WH7107> Vai-yak-tzi-fu They angered עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at מֵ֥י <WH4325> mei [him] also at the waters מְרִיבָ֑ה <WH4808> me-ri-Vah; provocation וַיֵּ֥רַע <WH3415> vai-Ye-ra' so that it went ill לְ֝מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> le-mo-Sheh, with Moses בַּעֲבוּרָֽם׃ <WH5668> ba-'a-vu-Ram. their account

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because הִמְר֥וּ <WH4784> him-Ru Because they provoked אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רוּח֑וֹ <WH7307> ru-Cho; his spirit וַ֝יְבַטֵּ֗א <WH981> vay-vat-Te, so that he spake unadvisedly בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃ <WH8193> bis-fa-Tav. with his lips

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not הִ֭שְׁמִידוּ <WH8045> Hish-mi-du They did not destroy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim; the nations אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> la-Hem. they

וַיִּתְעָרְב֥וּ <WH6148> vai-yit-'a-re-Vu But were mingled בַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> vag-go-Yim; among the heathen וַֽ֝יִּלְמְד֗וּ <WH3925> vai-yil-me-Du, and learned מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <WH4639> Ma-'a-sei-Hem. their works

וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> vai-ya-'av-Du And they served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH6091> 'a-tzab-bei-Hem; their idols וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu became לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> la-Hem like לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> le-mo-Kesh. which were a snare

וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ <WH2076> vai-yiz-be-Chu Yea they sacrificed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּ֭נֵיהֶם <WH1121> Be-nei-hem their sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1323> be-no-tei-Hem, and their daughters לַשֵּֽׁדִים׃ <WH7700> lash-She-dim. unto devils

וַיִּֽשְׁפְּכ֨וּ <WH8210> vai-yish-pe-Chu And shed דָ֪ם <WH1818> dam blood נָקִ֡י <WH5355> na-Ki innocent דַּם־ <WH1818> dam- [even] the blood בְּנֵ֘יהֶ֤ם <WH1121> be-Nei-Hem of their sons וּֽבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1323> u-ve-no-tei-Hem, and of their daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Whom זִ֭בְּחוּ <WH2076> Zib-be-chu whom they sacrificed לַעֲצַבֵּ֣י <WH6091> la-'a-tzab-Bei unto the idols כְנָ֑עַן <WH3667> che-Na-'an; of Canaan וַתֶּחֱנַ֥ף <WH2610> vat-te-che-Naf was polluted הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, and the land בַּדָּמִֽים׃ <WH1818> bad-da-Mim. with blood

וַיִּטְמְא֥וּ <WH2930> vai-yit-me-'U Thus were they defiled בְמַעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH4639> ve-ma-'a-sei-Hem; with their own works וַ֝יִּזְ֗נוּ <WH2181> vai-yiZ-nu, and went a whoring בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> be-Ma-'al-lei-Hem. with their own inventions

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> vai-yi-char- kindled אַ֣ף <WH639> 'af Therefore was the wrath יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> be-'am-Mo; against his people וַ֝יְתָעֵ֗ב <WH8581> vay-ta-'Ev, insomuch that he abhorred אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> na-cha-la-To. his own inheritance
